text: Vasavadatta is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by KS Gopalakrishnan.http://spicyonion.com/title/vasavadatta-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== *Poonam as Nalini *Ravi Menon *Nellikode Bhaskaran *Sukumaran as IG *Prem Navas as CM *Babloo Prithiveeraj *Kanakalatha as Principal *Vincent as Vincent *Pattom Sadan *Prameela *Lalithasree as Lalitha *Poojappura Ravi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Vasavadatta (film)
